attributes.action: Put Brexit on hold NOW until COVID has been beaten by a successful vaccine.
attributes.additional_details:
The perfect storm caused by escalating COVID and BREXIT is going to be devastating for the British people. A number of high level advice bodies such as the Bank of England, CBI etc are warning about the possible fractious consequences.
This should be heeded and BREXIT put on hold.
attributes.background: Immediately postpone Brexit until after COVID has been beaten by a successful vaccine.

rejection.details:
The UK left the EU on 31 January 2020. The transition period agreed between the UK and EU will end 31 December 2020. The UK Government cannot "pause" this itself, and any extension to the transition period would need to be agreed between the UK and EU.

We have accepted the following petition, which you might like to sign:

To Seek a 1 year Extension to the Brexit Transition Period & a Second Referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554492
